If a new student needs to be added to a Teaching Group, or the group require access to an additional course or book, you can update the Teaching Group on-screen.

To update or edit a Teaching Group:

  1. Click on the Teaching Groups tab and click on the name of the group you'd like to edit.
  2. Click the drop down arrow next to the name of your group (at the top of the right hand panel).
  3. You are then given the following options:
  • Edit this Teaching Group - this is useful for changing the name.
  • Delete this Teaching Group.
  • Add Student or a Teacher to this Teaching Group.
  • Add a Course to this Teaching Group - use this option to add another Kerboodle Book or Course to the group.
